#!/usr/bin/env ruby
print '<html><head><meta http-equiv="Refresh" content="0; URL=' print 'http://jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/validator?warning=1&profile=none&usermedium=all&text='
scope = STDIN.read
scope.gsub!(/<\/?style.*?>/, '')
((scope != nil && scope.size > 0) ? scope : $< ).each_byte do |b|
if b == 32 print '+' elsif b.chr =~ /\w/ print b.chr else printf '%%%02x', b end end
puts '#errors"></head><body></body></html>'
